prng.seeds

Class FileStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • prng.seeds.SeedStorage
      • prng.seeds.FileStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class FileStorage
extends SeedStorage
    Store all seed information in a single file and load it all into memory when needed.
    Author:
    Simon Greatrix
